comments.html: While I probably have more bias than most, I 100% agree with you here Ivan. I was discussing it the other day with someone and the lack of real innovation over the past 10 years seems like it will flood in. And if history is accurate, we will still have lots of people wondering where their buggy whip orders went.
comments.name: Unknown

comments.html: Great post and perfect analogy. But i think we need another small distinction between the technologies/features reinforcing the UNDERLYING network, be it routing or birding,  and other promoting the underlying network.
comments.name: Ofer
